thread.title: Park So Hyun shows professionalism even after rib fracture | allkpop.com

title: Park So Hyun shows professionalism even after rib fracture | allkpop.com
text:
Or Login / Register With Us Forgot Password? Remember Me Park So Hyun shows professionalism even after rib fracture By KpopJoA 2 minutes ago 158 0 0 0 Google+ Despite her recent injury, actress/DJ Park So Hyun managed to successfully finish the recording of SBS 'How Is that Possible' on February 14.
An SBS representative stated, "Although she felt pain, the actress/DJ didn't let her fellow staff down and took pain medication, resuming the show. She is very passionate in what she does. We hope for a full recovery soon." 
In regards to the broadcast, "The next recording has not been confirmed yet as Park So Hyun is still in the healing process." 
New-Able Entertainment commented "She did the recording even though she had trouble breathing. She is one dedicated person. As for her health condition, it is still uncertain. She needs to rest for a month. She will be taking a week off and will see how things go from there. We apologize for the inconvenience."
